visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Monthly Costs', Axes and labels styling: Y-axis labels should be formatted with a dollar sign and have a font size of 12px, Y-axis title should be 'Cost' with a font size of 14px, Data series: One series named 'Monthly Costs' with the provided data, Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green for the columns, Additional configurations: Set chart margins to 50px top and bottom, 100px left and right, and add a legend at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart titled 'Monthly Costs'. The Y-axis labels are formatted to include a dollar sign and have a font size of 12px, while the Y-axis title 'Cost' is styled with a font size of 14px. The chart displays one data series named 'Monthly Costs' with the given data points. The columns are colored with a gradient from blue to green, enhancing visual appeal. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50px top and bottom, 100px left and right, and positioning the legend at the bottom of the chart for better readability.
